name: Eternally Bound
description: A small top-down game. You play as Death and Life, their existence eternally bound together. Your goal is to kill as many of the attackers in red as possible and save the innocent people in green. Death can damage people and Life can heal them. Damage heals Death and healing heals Life. However, damage hurts Life and healing hurts Death. Therein lies the game. Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021.
